prompt: I need a video translator that can transcribe Spanish videos into English.

hidden_queries: video translator that can transcribe Spanish videos into English software tool
tools to translate Spanish video to English transcript

sources.title: Translate Spanish Video to English — Online + Free - Kapwing
sources.snippet: Bypass the slow, expensive process of manual translation with Kapwing’s online Spanish to English video translator. Upload your video file, whether it's MP4, MOV, or AVI, and instantly generate subtitles, transcripts, and dubbed voices. The AI-powered Translation Studio is designed for creators, marketers, and educators who need high-quality English versions of Spanish content without ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are reliable video translator tools that can transcribe Spanish videos into English (text and optional subtitles/voice): Online AI Video Translators Kapwing – Upload Spanish video, auto-transcribe and translate to English subtitles or dubbed audio. Kapwing

sources.title: Translate Spanish video to English - Happy Scribe
sources.snippet: If you want to translate a video from Spanish to English, you can use HappyScribe's transcription and translation services. First, choose a transcription service to convert the Spanish video to text.

citation_mappings.claim_text: HappyScribe – Automatic Spanish transcription → English translation; export subtitle files (SRT/VTT). HappyScribe
VEED.io – Transcribe Spanish audio and translate to English, with optional AI dubbing. VEED.IO
OpusClip (Opus.pro) – AI translation with synced captions and natural voiceovers. Opus
HeyGen – Online translator with subtitle generation and voiceovers. HeyGen
Vizard – Simple Spanish-to-English video translator with export options. Vizard
Clideo – Upload Spanish video, auto-translate audio and add English subtitles or voiceover. Clideo
Maestra AI – Video translator with subtitle and voice cloning options. Maestra AI
Zeemo AI – Translate video to English with customizable captions. Zeemo
